DocAttribute.Name: Axis3
DocAttribute.Documentation: The exact direction of U[3], the derived Z axis direction.

DocAttribute.Name: U
DocAttribute.Documentation: The list of mutually orthogonal, normalized vectors defining the transformation matrix T. They are derived from the explicit attributes Axis3, Axis1, and Axis2 in that order.

DocWhereRule.Name: DimIs3D
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The coordinate space dimensionality of this entity shall be 3.

DocWhereRule.Name: Axis1Is3D
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The inherited Axis1 should have (if given) the dimensionality of 3.

DocWhereRule.Name: Axis2Is3D
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The inherited Axis2 should have (if given) the dimensionality of 3.

DocWhereRule.Name: Axis3Is3D
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The Axis3 should have (if given) the dimensionality of 3.
